description: Examples tables must have at least 2 rows of test data to demonstrate variations. Single row Examples tables should be regular scenarios instead.

do.content:
Examples:
| request_message | detected_keywords |
|----------------|-------------------|
| start shaping | shaping |
| plan new project | planning,new project |
| build story map | story map |

dont.content:
Examples:
| request_message |
|----------------|
| start shaping |
(WRONG - only one row, should be regular scenario)
